name: Workazooka
description:
Walk: WASD or Arrow Keys

Mouse: point and shoot!

E: Stare your coworkers with pure hate

Grab as Reasons to Live (hearts) from cheerful and wholesome things of your life, and change them for juicy profit in the Financial Circle, in front of the Pentium of Sacrifice.

But beware! Your ghostly coworkers will try to give you extra paperwork and take your Reasons to Live for themselves.

Afortunately, you have your Workzooka to push them away with old files from Scam&Co’s laboratories.

They walk slowly too, because they can’t even do THAT right.
